content: this pattern is free for a limited time my hope is that you are able to take time daily to do the things you love doing like knitting socks staggered stillness is a cuff to toe unisex sock pattern with a rhythmic pattern utilizing lovely yarn this pattern uses simple ribbing that is staggered and stacked to create elongated blocks on the cuff which flow into smaller staggered stacked mini blocks on the top of the foot the beautiful variegated yarn adds dimension to the simple pattern design this is an ideal pattern to knit while sitting in stillness watching tv listening to an audio book enjoying a conversation with a loved one materials 1 skein september 2023 sock squad highwood sock by farmers daughter fibers 80% superwash merino / 20% nylon with 400 yards per skein color milkweed light pink with gray tones or 1 skein april 2023 sock squad pintler sock by farmers daughter fibers 75% superwash merino 25% nylon with 463 yards color dandelion soft yellow with green tones
